message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be highly beneficial for you. I think $11,000 is a fair price considering its value. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm really interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. Would you be willing to go down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate you countering.  I understand your position, but $10,000 is cutting it a bit too close to my bottom line. Could we agree on $10,600?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $10,600. How about we meet in the middle at $10,300?  I'm confident this price works for both of us.
